original_title: ＳＦロリータファンタジー「ＯＭＥ－１」
overview: As Gonad the Barbarian plans to rule the galaxy, the Sex Wars saga continues in full animation as Princess Orgasma, the great Princess Layme and Pussy La'Mour search out new sexual adventures in the far-flung erotic regions of outer space.
title: SF Lolita Fantasy Ome-1
